LanguageData.XFMParmor_LordJob_AntiMParmor: The mech crushers are satisfied with the destruction of mechframes and are leaving.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Wreckage_OutQuest_LetterB: You have acquired the mechframe core in the wreckage! You may leave the area freely, just remember to double check whether you've take the core with you.
